name: Spicy Hell Boy Odyssey
description:
You will enjoy funny adventures full of danger with Spicy Boy Adventure.
The game has a lot of traps, various enemies ( stay alert at all time ).
It `a simple game play with lovely nice graphics and smoothing music and sounds.. Lots of scenes ( jungle, frozen land, icy jungle, hot subway and tunnel ), funny faces and characters
- Use button to jump ( + ability to double jump )
- Move right or left with narrow
